name: AK-74 magazine
description: A 30-round standard 5.45x39mm magazine compatible with AK-74 type rifles, made of steel-reinforced polymer.

name: AK-74 extended magazine
description: A 45-round extended 5.45x39mm magazine compatible with AK-74 type rifles, made of steel-reinforced polymer.  Originally designed for the RPK-74 light machine gun.

name: AK-74 compact magazine
description: A 20-round compact 5.45x39mm magazine compatible with AK-74 type rifles, made of steel-reinforced polymer.  Originally designed for the AKS-74U carbine
